title: Which Sona skin to buy?
body: Hey guys! I am a Sona main and she is my favorite champion. At the moment I own Arcade skin. With Christmas around, I am definitely going to get enough RP for  to afford at least an Ultimate Skin. However, now that Silent Night Sona is on sale, I am quite perplexed. If I buy the Silent Night, I might be able to afford another champ skin. BUT THAT DJ SKIN SOOOOOOOOOOOO GOOOOOODDDD!!!!!!!

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure you don't main Sona anymore, but I'll say this anyway:
HA, you pathetic fool! Why only get one of her skins when you can take somebody's credit card and irresponsibly spend money for in game cosmetics like half of the League of Legends community! (I currently have Pentakill, Silent Night, Guqin, Aracde, DJ, and Sweetheart Sona and is missing Muse Sona because she is    in the vault ;w;)

i would recommand sweetheart Sona for the sexy hands http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQCtITiqsXEcX23ky-FReUinA7ldepa07JMdfqWeQZceSzWkS_BracJoKU

DJ Sona is a great skin and in the end I would fully recommend getting that skin over Silent Night Sona. 
Besides PFE, All of the Ultimate skins are 100% worth it. 
Silent Night is nice, but isn't worth buying, even at the current price.
It's a very nice skin, but can feel like it does little to change your overall feel. 
DJ Sona brings a whole new experience.

I currently own Muse, Guqin, and Sweetheart. 

Muse was a good change back before her model update-- I don't use it nearly as much as I used to. Guqin was and probably still is my favorite just because of the delicate look and the musical changes (not too drastic, though).

Sweetheart is a really good mid-tier skin that offers a lot of changes for little more money.
Silent night for the feels bruh!
